hero.title: Automate Your Processes with Corede.AI
hero.description: See how our AI agents can automate your processes with a live demo, and get your questions answered by our experts.

overview.title: Overview & Benefits
overview.description: COREDE.AI "AI Agents" solutions improve your business's critical processes by simultaneously optimizing operational costs, decision-making speed, and team efficiency.

contentAutomation.title: Content Automation
contentAutomation.feature1Description: Provides precise article, post, or email body generation with predefined templates and toning.
contentAutomation.feature2Description: Analyzes and summarizes long texts, selecting and reorganizing the most relevant sections.
contentAutomation.feature3Description: Creates automatic adaptation of language level, structure, and keyword strategy according to the target audience.
contentAutomation.feature4Description: Increases search visibility with keyword suggestions and title optimization.
contentAutomation.description: By performing automatic content generation and curation; creates and optimizes all text-based outputs from blog posts to social media shares, from product descriptions to newsletters with AI support.

messagingAutomation.title: Messaging Automation
messagingAutomation.description: Smart bots that provide 24/7, automatic response and interaction in email, chat, and social media messaging channels.
messagingAutomation.feature1Description: Real-time user chat on your website; instantly answers frequently asked questions.
messagingAutomation.feature2Description: Personalized email flows; creates follow-ups based on trigger events.
messagingAutomation.feature3Description: Integrated with platforms such as WhatsApp, Messenger, Telegram, provides management from a single panel.
messagingAutomation.feature4Description: Helps you get feedback on response rates, satisfaction scores, and most frequently raised issues.

voiceAutomation.title: Voice Automation
voiceAutomation.description: IVR systems and speech-based assistants that handle and direct customer calls; reduce call volume and increase self-service rates.
voiceAutomation.feature1Description: Provides voice command detection and response generation support with Natural Language Processing (NLP).
voiceAutomation.feature2Description: Provides multi-layered menu and speech-based routing, transferring to a live operator when necessary.
voiceAutomation.feature3Description: Analyzes the emotional state in the conversation flow to flag critical calls.
voiceAutomation.feature4Description: Converts call records into text to create call analytics.

whyAiAgents.title: Why Ai Agents?
whyAiAgents.feature1: Continuous Operation: Maintains your operations without requiring 24/7 live support.
whyAiAgents.feature2: Flexible Integration: Easily connects to your existing CRM, ERP, or data warehouse infrastructure.
whyAiAgents.feature3: Scalability: Quickly adds new agents to distribute workload as needed.

aiDecisionAgents.title: AI Decision-Making Agents
aiDecisionAgents.description: Smart agents that automatically detect and provide suggestions and guidance for your complex decision processes in light of your data.
aiDecisionAgents.bullet2: Shortens the decision-making cycle by up to 40%.
aiDecisionAgents.bullet3: Improves performance over time with continuous learning.

dataVisualization.title: Data Visualization
dataVisualization.description: Brings business intelligence data together with interactive graphics and dashboards, allowing all stakeholders to easily monitor the current situation.
dataVisualization.bullet1: Eliminates information gaps in decision processes.
dataVisualization.bullet2: Offers up to 50% visibility increase in critical indicators.

getOffer.headline: GET AN OFFER
getOffer.title: Get an Offer for Your Project Right Now
getOffer.description: Fill out a short form to immediately receive our detailed proposal tailored to the scope and scale of your work.

featuredSectors.title: Featured Sectors
featuredSectors.demoDescription: Vehicle maintenance process automatic planning and inventory management system predicts real-time malfunctions from sensor data to detect potential problems in advance, automatically creates necessary orders with spare parts need analyses, and manages maintenance processes without interruption by planning service appointments. This reduces failure-related downtime by 35% while achieving a 20% reduction in costs related to excess inventory.

auth.quote2: Customer service should not be a department. It should be the entire company.

auth.quote5: In sales, a referral is the key to the door of resistance.
auth.quote6: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
auth.quote7: One of the greatest gifts you can give to anyone is the gift of your attention.
auth.quote8: Do what you do so well that they will want to see it again and bring their friends.

hero.title: Meet the Future of Technology
hero.subtitle: Empower Your Business with Cutting-Edge AI Solutions
hero.description: At Corede.AI, we accelerate your digital transformation with state-of-the-art artificial intelligence and automation solutions. Our robust technology and expert team provide trusted, innovative support every step of the way.

aboutUs.title: Innovation, Trust, and Excellence
aboutUs.description: Corede.AI is a leader in AI technology, delivering solutions that optimize processes and enhance decision-making. Our mission is to drive business growth through data-driven strategies and personalized innovation. With a team of seasoned experts and a strong track record, we bring reliability and professionalism to every project.

aiAgentSolutions.title: AI Agent Solutions
aiAgentSolutions.description: Empower your operations with intelligent decision support, dynamic data visualization, and seamless automation. Our AI Agents provide actionable insights and streamline your workflow.

dataVisualization.title: Data Visualization
dataVisualization.description: Transform complex data into clear, actionable insights with our data visualization tools. Our intuitive dashboards and interactive charts help you uncover patterns, track KPIs, and make data-driven decisions with confidence.

messagingAutomation.title: Messaging Automation
messagingAutomation.description: Automate your communication workflows with smart messaging solutions. Our AI-driven platform ensures timely and personalized interactions that boost customer engagement and operational efficiency.

decisionSupport.title: Decision Support
decisionSupport.description: Make informed decisions with our AI-powered analytics. Get real-time insights, predictive models, and actionable recommendations that help you navigate complex business challenges with confidence.

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.description: Tailored solutions designed specifically for your business needs. Our team works closely with you to develop and implement solutions that address your unique challenges and maximize your competitive advantage.

features.title: Expertise & Experience
features.description: Our experts bring your vision to life with precision and excellence.

features.title: Tailored Approach
features.description: We deliver unique solutions with our personalized approach to every project.

features.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
features.description: We develop pioneering solutions using the latest technologies.

features.title: Proven Success
features.description: Our success stories with our clients are our greatest reference.

header.title: Used by top teams across the globe

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions
faq.description: Explore the section below for answers to the most common questions and more information.

questions.question: What are the core services offered by Corede AI?
questions.answer: At Corede AI, we offer AI agents, data visualization, messaging automation, decision support systems, and custom solutions tailored to your business.

questions.question: Which industries are your AI solutions suitable for?
questions.answer: Our solutions are designed to be adaptable for various sectors including finance, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, logistics, and many more.

questions.question: Are your services suitable for small businesses?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer scalable solutions for businesses of all sizes. We have special packages tailored to the needs and budgets of small businesses.

questions.question: How can I start working with Corede AI?
questions.answer: You can contact us to request a free demo or schedule an evaluation meeting with our consultants.

questions.question: How long does it take to integrate AI solutions?
questions.answer: Integration time varies depending on the complexity and scope of the project. Simple solutions can be implemented within a few weeks, while more comprehensive projects may take 2-3 months.

questions.question: How is data security ensured?
questions.answer: We use the latest security protocols and encryption technologies, adhering to international standards for data privacy and security.

featuredSectors.title: Featured Sectors
featuredSectors.section-1-description: Vehicle maintenance process automatic planning and inventory management system predicts real-time malfunctions from sensor data to detect potential problems in advance, automatically creates necessary orders with spare parts need analyses, and manages maintenance processes without interruption by planning service appointments. This reduces failure-related downtime by 35% while achieving a 20% reduction in costs related to excess inventory.
featuredSectors.section-2-description: Automated patient scheduling and appointment management system, using AI-driven analytics to optimize resource allocation and patient flow, reducing wait times and improving overall healthcare operations.
featuredSectors.section-3-description: Automated student enrollment and course management system, using AI-driven analytics to optimize resource allocation and student flow, reducing wait times and improving overall education operations.
featuredSectors.section-4-description: Automated customer order and inventory management system, using AI-driven analytics to optimize resource allocation and customer flow, reducing wait times and improving overall retail operations.
featuredSectors.section-5-description: Automated production planning and inventory management system, using AI-driven analytics to optimize resource allocation and production flow, reducing wait times and improving overall manufacturing operations.
featuredSectors.section-6-description: Automated logistics planning and inventory management system, using AI-driven analytics to optimize resource allocation and logistics flow, reducing wait times and improving overall logistics operations.
featuredSectors.section-7-description: Automated telecommunications planning and inventory management system, using AI-driven analytics to optimize resource allocation and telecommunications flow, reducing wait times and improving overall telecommunications operations.
featuredSectors.section-8-description: Automated finance planning and inventory management system, using AI-driven analytics to optimize resource allocation and finance flow, reducing wait times and improving overall finance operations.
featuredSectors.section-9-description: Automated e-commerce planning and inventory management system, using AI-driven analytics to optimize resource allocation and e-commerce flow, reducing wait times and improving overall e-commerce operations.

hero.title: Scalable, intelligence‑driven software—delivered with precision and measurable impact.

whyAiPowered.title:
Why
 "AI‑Powered"?
whyAiPowered.description: AI is not just a feature added to the final product; it works in our development pipeline. Corede.AI uses big language models and predictive analytics at every step of the software lifecycle:
whyAiPowered.list-1: AI Co‑Coding: With dual pilots powered by GPT, an average of 30% of lines of code are automatically generated; 25% fewer bugs caught in code reviews.
whyAiPowered.list-2: Automated Testing & Security: Increases release quality with model-based test case generation, dynamic CVE scanning, and instant fix recommendations.
whyAiPowered.list-3: Sprint Optimization: Shifts team focus to strategic innovation by entrusting backlog prioritization to predictive models.

aiPoweredSolutions.title: AI‑Powered Software Development Solutions
aiPoweredSolutions.section-1-description: Powered by scalable custom web applications, microservices architecture, and LLM-powered content. Provides rapid decision support with interactive dashboards, real-time analytics, and Slack/Teams integrations. Provides <1s LCP and high SEO compliance with landing pages, static generation, and edge caching. Offers full accessibility with AI-powered interfaces, natural language navigation, and personalized content.
aiPoweredSolutions.section-2-description: Native mobile apps with Swift and Kotlin work offline with low latency and on-device ML. Cross-platform apps built with React Native or Flutter learn together across iOS and Android with shared AI SDK.
aiPoweredSolutions.section-3-description: Intelligent online stores increase profitability with dynamic pricing, inventory forecasting, and omnichannel POS integration. Personalized shopping experience is powered by visual search, instant recommendations, and GPT-powered segmentation.

whyChoose.title: What Makes Us Different
whyChoose.description-1: Senior engineers and certified AI architects; defined SLA and weekly progress reports
whyChoose.description-2: Scalable and secure solutions that fit your users' needs
whyChoose.description-3: Continuous feedback throughout the process until product completion

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.story-1: TalentPulse (HR Tech) – AI-based resume screening and automated interview scheduling reduced time to hire from 35 days to 19 days; candidate satisfaction increased to 94%.
successStories.story-2: BrightLearn (EdTech) – Adaptive learning engine increased course completion from 65% to 92%; instructor feedback time halved.
successStories.story-3: PeopleFirst Consulting (HR Analytics) – Predictive turnover dashboards reduced annual employee turnover by 17%.

technologiesUsed.title: Technologies Used
technologiesUsed.description: Corede.AI uses the best practices in AI software development. This way, our customers can optimize their software development processes.
technologiesUsed.description-4: AWS (EKS, Lambda), Azure DevOps, Docker, Kubernetes
technologiesUsed.description-5: PostgreSQL, Redis, Apache Kafka, OpenAI GPT‑4o, Hugging Face
technologiesUsed.description-6: OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, SOC2, GDPR Onay SDK'sı
